title: vesselFM: A Foundation Model for Universal 3D Blood Vessel Segmentation
details: B Wittmann, Y Wattenberg, T Amiranashvili, S Shit… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Segmenting 3D blood vessels is a critical yet challenging task in medical image analysis. This is due to significant imaging modality-specific variations in artifacts, vascular patterns and scales, signal-to-noise ratios, and background tissues. These …
